tooltip.item.gogspells.ancient_regal_fab: Special drop of Mummy when equipping Blessing of Gaia
tooltip.item.gogspells.grief_seed: Special drop of Witch(GoG) when equipping Blessing of Gaia
tooltip.item.gogspells.gaia_blessing: Add bonus drop rate of certain loots when killing certain mobs
spell.gogspells.summon_ender_dragon_girl: Summon Ender Dragon Girl to fight for you.
spell.gogspells.summon_nine_tails.guide: Summon Nine Tails to fight for you. She can shoot firebolts.
spell.gogspells.summon_werecat.guide: Summon Werecat(s) to fight for you.
spell.gogspells.summon_sludge_girl.guide: Summon Sludge Girl(s) to fight for you. She will poison your enemies.
spell.gogspells.summon_yuki_onna.guide: Summon Yuki Onna to fight for you. She can shoot icicles.
spell.gogspells.summon_mummy.guide: Summon Mummy to fight for you. She will also summon gravemites.
spell.gogspells.summon_valkyrie.guide: Summon Valkyrie to fight for you.
spell.gogspells.summon_witch.guide: Summon Witch to fight for you. She will use magic spells and potions.
death.attack.gogspells.summon_nine_tails: %1$s was cut and roasted well by %2$s.
death.attack.gogspells.summon_werecat: %1$s was ripped to pieces by %2$s like a pillow in a cat’s frenzy.
death.attack.gogspells.summon_yuki_onna: %1$s was made into ice cream by %2$s.
death.attack.gogspells.summon_valkyrie: %1$s was sent to Valhalla by %2$s, maybe?
